title: DeSyn
shortDescription: DeSyn is a decentralized liquidity infrastructure on Web3, empowering investors, projects, and security companies.
author: DeSyn
description: DeSyn provides decentralized liquidity infrastructure on Web3, enabling collaboration among investors, projects, and security companies to manage and build liquidity solutions.

title: Pell Network
shortDescription: Pell Network is the first omnichain BTC restaking network, unlocking Bitcoin's potential in cryptoeconomic security.
author: Pell Network
description: Pell Network enables Bitcoin holders to participate in restaking, extending Bitcoinâ€™s security to other protocols while earning yield.

title: LayerBank
shortDescription: LayerBank is a universal permissionless on-chain bank.
author: LayerBank
description: LayerBank functions as a permissionless on-chain bank, providing a wide range of financial services directly on the blockchain.

title: BitFi
shortDescription: BitFi generates organic yield on BTC through funding rate arbitrage trading.
author: BitFi
description: BitFi enables users to generate organic yield on BTC through a funding rate arbitrage strategy, providing a unique approach to BTC yield generation.

title: ZeroLend
shortDescription: ZeroLend is an efficient lending market on multiple networks, offering dominant lending solutions.
author: ZeroLend
description: ZeroLend provides an efficient and dominant lending market across networks, ensuring streamlined borrowing and lending processes for decentralized finance applications.

title: Sushi
shortDescription: Sushi is a community-driven decentralized exchange (DEX) for trading and providing liquidity.
author: Sushi
description: Sushi is a community-driven decentralized exchange (DEX) for trading and providing liquidity.

title: Meson
shortDescription: Meson enables fast, safe, and low-cost cross-chain swaps across leading blockchains and layer-2 rollups.
author: Meson
description: Meson provides universal cross-chain swap capabilities with a focus on speed, safety, and low transaction costs, facilitating seamless asset exchanges.

title: Satoshi Protocol
shortDescription: Satoshi Protocol is the first universal stablecoin protocol backed by Bitcoin.
author: Satoshi Protocol
description: Satoshi Protocol uses Bitcoin as collateral to mint its native stablecoin, satUSD, offering a unique approach to stablecoin issuance.

title: Steer Protocol
shortDescription: Steer Protocol offers modular infrastructure for one-click apps built on top of web3 protocols.
author: Steer Protocol
description: Steer Protocol provides composable and modular infrastructure to build and deploy one-click applications on web3, streamlining development processes.

title: LendOS
shortDescription: LendOS is a decentralized lending operating system deployed across multiple blockchain networks.
author: LendOS
description: LendOS provides a decentralized lending infrastructure that supports multiple blockchain networks, streamlining lending and borrowing processes.

title: DODO
shortDescription: DODO is a decentralized exchange that revolutionizes liquidity provision with proactive market making.
author: DODO
description: DODO leverages innovative algorithms for proactive market making and offers a decentralized trading platform with efficient liquidity solutions.

title: SatLayer
shortDescription: SatLayer leverages Bitcoin as collateral to secure decentralized applications as a Bitcoin Validated Service (BVS).
author: SatLayer
description: SatLayer uses BTC as economic collateral to secure dApps and protocols, providing a Bitcoin-validated service that enhances security.

title: Satoshi Protocol
shortDescription: Satoshi Protocol is the first universal stablecoin protocol backed by Bitcoin.
author: Satoshi Protocol
description: Satoshi Protocol uses Bitcoin as collateral to mint its native stablecoin, satUSD, offering a unique approach to stablecoin issuance.

title: Rabby Wallet
shortDescription: Rabby Wallet is a game-changing wallet for Ethereum and all EVM chains.
author: Rabby
description: Rabby Wallet provides advanced features and a user-friendly interface, enabling seamless interactions across Ethereum and other EVM-compatible chains.

title: UniSat
shortDescription: UniSat is an open-source browser extension and mobile Bitcoin wallet for trading, inscribing, and managing assets.
author: UniSat
description: UniSat provides a mobile and browser-based Bitcoin wallet that enables trading, inscribing, and effective asset management in a decentralized environment.

title: YieldFi
shortDescription: YieldFi is a decentralized crypto asset management platform offering high yields.
author: YieldFi
description: YieldFi delivers decentralized asset management solutions with a focus on high yield opportunities and efficient capital allocation.

title: YieldNest
shortDescription: YieldNest is a liquid restaking protocol providing streamlined access to high-yield, risk-adjusted DeFi strategies.
author: YieldNest
description: YieldNest offers liquid restaking strategies designed to provide risk-adjusted yield opportunities in the decentralized finance space.

title: PumpBTC
shortDescription: PumpBTC is a liquid staking solution for Babylon, helping BTC holders maximize yields through staking.
author: PumpBTC
description: PumpBTC offers liquid staking that maximizes yield potential for BTC holders by leveraging Babylon's staking mechanisms.

title: Lorenzo
shortDescription: Mission: To be the premier Bitcoin platform for yield-bearing token issuance, trading, and settlement.
author: Lorenzo
description: Mission: To be the premier Bitcoin platform for yield-bearing token issuance, trading, and settlement.

title: Hemi Staking

author: Hemi Staking
description: Hemi Staking provides liquid staking options to support Hemi network participation.

title: VaultCraft

author: VaultCraft
description: VaultCraft offers yield aggregation solutions to enhance yield strategies in DeFi.

description: Uniswap provides decentralized token swaps through automated liquidity pools.

title: IziSwap

description: IziSwap offers streamlined decentralized swapping services.

title: PassDEX

title: Pure Finance

title: Demos
